doc.field: The Bank of England said it has satisfied its revised estimate of today's shortfall in the money market, providing 261 mln stg assistance in afternoon operations. The Bank bought in band one, 60 mln stg bank bills at 9-7/8 pct and in band two 200 mln stg bank bills and one mln stg treasury bills at 9-13/16 pct. This brings the total help so far today to 364 mln stg, compared with its deficit estimate of 350 mln stg. REUTER
